app.name: Ensemble AI
app.tagline: Make better decisions with multiple AI perspectives

free.title: Free Mode
free.description: Bring your own API keys from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and xAI. Keys are stored securely in your browser.

pro.title: Pro Mode
pro.description: Purchase credits to access all providers without managing API keys. Simple, secure, and hassle-free.

about.title: About Ensemble AI
about.description: The science behind better decisions with AI ensembles

whatIsEnsemble.heading: What is Ensemble AI?
whatIsEnsemble.body: Ensemble AI lets you query multiple large language models simultaneously and compare their responses side by side. Instead of relying on a single model's perspective, you get diverse viewpoints from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and xAI — then synthesise them into a consensus answer.

whyEnsemble.heading: Why an Ensemble?
whyEnsemble.body: Every AI model has blind spots. A question that stumps one model may be trivial for another. This is the model selection paradox: you cannot know which model will perform best on your specific question until you have already asked it. An ensemble approach eliminates this guesswork by harnessing the complementary strengths of multiple models, producing more reliable and well-rounded answers.

research.heading: The Research
research.intro: The ensemble approach is grounded in peer-reviewed research demonstrating that multiple AI models working together consistently outperform any single model.

papers.title: Mixture-of-Agents Enhances Large Language Model Capabilities
papers.finding: Open-source LLM ensembles collectively surpassed GPT-4o by 7.6% on AlpacaEval 2.0.

papers.title: Improving Factuality and Reasoning in Language Models through Multiagent Debate
papers.finding: Multi-model debate improved GSM8K math accuracy from 77% to 85%.

papers.title: ReConcile: Round-Table Conference Improves Reasoning via Consensus
papers.finding: Up to 11.4% improvement over single-model baselines through structured consensus.

papers.title: Iterative Consensus Ensemble of LLMs for Medical Question Answering
papers.finding: Achieved a 23% accuracy gain on medical questions through iterative LLM consensus.

papers.title: Harnessing Multiple LLMs: A Survey on Collaboration, Competition and Synergy
papers.finding: Comprehensive taxonomy of multi-LLM collaboration strategies and their effectiveness.

features.title: Features
features.description: Query 12+ AI models simultaneously, analyse their agreement, and synthesise the best answer

items.title: Agreement Analysis
items.body: See exactly where models agree or diverge. Vector embeddings and cosine similarity create an N×N comparison matrix with colour-coded results.

items.title: Dual Consensus Strategies
items.body: Standard: synthesise all responses. Elo Ranking: tournament-style LLM judging ranks responses, then synthesises only the top performers.

items.title: Human + AI Integration
items.body: Add responses from external tools, human experts, or other AI services. Included in agreement analysis and consensus generation.

items.label: AI Models
items.description: Across OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and xAI

howItWorks.heading: From Question to Consensus in 4 Steps

steps.name: Configure
steps.description: Choose Free Mode with AES-256 encrypted API keys or Pro Mode with managed credits.

steps.name: Select Ensemble
steps.description: Pick 2–6 models across 4 providers. Choose your summariser and consensus method.

steps.name: Enter Prompt
steps.description: Write your question. Optionally add manual responses from experts or external tools.

steps.name: Review & Analyse
steps.description: Watch responses stream in parallel. See agreement analysis and synthesised consensus in real-time.

modes.heading: Two Ways to Use Ensemble AI

free.heading: Free Mode
free.body: Bring your own API keys. Direct browser-to-API communication with zero server dependency.

pro.heading: Pro Mode
pro.body: Managed backend with credit-based billing. No API key management needed.

models.heading: 12+ Models Across 4 Providers
models.body: Access the best models from every leading AI provider. New models appear automatically via dynamic discovery.

providers.name: Anthropic
providers.models: Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Claude 3 Opus, Claude 3 Haiku

providers.name: Google
providers.models: Gemini 1.5 Pro, Gemini 1.5 Flash, Gemini 2.5 Flash

security.heading: Security & Privacy
security.body: AES-256-GCM encryption with zero server-side storage in Free Mode.
features: AES-256-GCM encryption via Web Crypto API
No server-side key storage in Free Mode
No prompts or responses logged or stored
